00202             function                process_sape_common_links( $Str , $Changed )
00203             {
00204                   try
00205                   {
00206                         if( strpos( $Str , '{sape_common_links}' ) !== false )
00207                         {
00208                               $Str = str_replace( '{sape_common_links}' , '{sape_common_links:p=0}' , $Str );
00209                         }
00210                         
00211                         for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'sape_common_links' ) ; )
00212                         {
00213                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
00214                               
00215                               $Count = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'count' , null );
00216                               $Links = $this->SapeClient->return_links( $Count );
00217                               $Str = str_replace( "{sape_common_links:$MacroParameters}" , $Links , $Str );
00218                               $Changed = true;
00219                         }
00220                         
00221                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00222                   }
00223                   catch( Exception $e )
00224                   {
00225                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00226                   }
00227             }
00228             
00255             function                process_sape_context_links( $Str , $Changed )
00256             {
00257                   try
00258                   {
00259                         if( strpos( $Str , '{sape_context_links}' ) !== false )
00260                         {
00261                               $Str = str_replace( '{sape_context_links}' , '{sape_context_links:p=0}' , $Str );
00262                         }
00263                         
00264                         for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'sape_context_links' ) ; )
00265                         {
00266                               $Text = $this->String->get_block_data( 
00267                                     $Str , "sape_context_links:$MacroParameters" , '~sape_context_links'
00268                               );
00269                               
00270                               $Text = $this->SapeContext->replace_in_text_segment( $Text );
00271                               
00272                               $Str = $this->String->replace_block( 
00273                                     $Str , "sape_context_links:$MacroParameters" , '~sape_context_links' , $Text
00274                               );
00275                               $Changed = true;
00276                         }
00277                         
00278                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00279                   }
00280                   catch( Exception $e )
00281                   {
00282                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00283                   }
00284             }

00316             function                process_string( $Options , $Str , &$Changed )
00317             {
00318                   try
00319                   {
00320                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_sape_common_links( $Str , $Changed );
00321                         
00322                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_sape_context_links( $Str , $Changed );
00323                         
00324                         return( $Str );
00325                   }
00326                   catch( Exception $e )
00327                   {
00328                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
